TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content: 52 more to 3 bars! Here I come!
**8 MOAR** to four bars.

**1 point.**

**reprepreprepreprep**

Infinity.

I archieved 6 light green bars.

Still eight more.

Come on, I have a company with craft up, people! I only got 5 rep points so far with that.

Ok.

![eGNdjnR.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/eGNdjnR.jpg)
I'm only **27** off my second green bar. Gotta start a series or something rep-worthy.
I don't provide this information. You'll need to install Kerbal Engineer to see it.

My fake internet points? Don't know; don't care.

Here's some cat tax

![iouwxyz.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/iouwxyz.jpg)
7 more rep to 200, about to release my Pioneer 10/11 detailed mod replica, and I should totally build a moving working levitating Dalek in KSP.

How close am I to my next reputation rank?

Error 403: Forbidden You do not have permission to view this information

Error 418: I'm a teapot [This is a genuine error code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_HTTP_status_codes).

But I'll tell you anyway. I'm 30 away from the next rank.
17 away from 3 bars.
